group_1.textLeft: I have no idea why she gave this to me...

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*@Jeez! What am I supposed to do...
It's not like me to worry about things like this...

group_1.textRight: Well, Rika, what do you want to do?

group_1.textLeft: What? I...?

group_1.textRight: She gave you a chocolate gateau,@and it wasn't a mistake.
These are the only facts at hand.
But you don't know her intentions@or how she felt about giving it to you.
For that...you're going to have to ask her directly.
And we don't have much material to speculate on.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're right...

group_1.textRight: But, considering the fact@that she gave you chocolate...
You're free to do anything you want, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: Free?@To do whatever I want?

group_1.textRight: Well, you probably shouldn't@do anything antisocial, but...
It's Valentine's Day.
I think the best thing you can do@is be honest about your feelings.

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*
That's...but...@[chara:303150:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:303150:motion_300][chara:303150:lipSynch_1]Yeah, no, I don't...have the right to do that...
Not when I warped her feelings...the way I did.

group_1.textRight: Rika, that's not what's happening here.

group_1.textLeft: No, it's the exact same thing!
I'm not ready to admit...@that I still have feelings for her!
I forced her to change her mind!@I took her away from her boyfriend...!
I took everything you're not supposed to do...@and I did it!
And so...what I really need...@is to get rid of these feelings...

group_1.textRight: Sure, keeping yourself under control is important.
But...
When you think about someone...@When you think about someone you love...
Denying your feelings won't erase them.

group_1.textLeft: But...!

group_1.textRight: Because that's what it means to@fall in love with someone, right?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:303150:lipSynch_1]Ah...

group_1.textRight: You don't have to force yourself to@deny your feelings, or hate them.
And if anyone gives you a hard time about it,
just keep telling them,@"Mind your own business."
So, accept your feelings.
You're free to think and feel whatever you want,@after all.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.

group_1.textCenter: (When I got the chocolate...@I was actually really happy...)
(I was happy...@I couldn't forgive myself for being so...happy...)
(It felt like she was saying I was still important@to her, even if I couldn't be her true love.)
(Even though I was trying to tell myself@I was totally over her..)
(That's why...@I felt like I shouldn't admit it, but...)
(The worst thing I can do...is to do nothing.)

group_1.textLeft: Miko-senpai, I want to give her chocolate.
I don't know what she meant@by giving me that chocolate.
But I want to give her a proper gift...@and apologize for avoiding her.
I don't know if we'll ever@be best friends again, but...
I want us to be on speaking terms...at least a little.

group_1.textRight: Alright.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
And besides, I don't know what she means by this...
I'd like to ask her why she gave me the chocolate.
I think...we need to face each other.

group_1.textRight: That's right.

group_1.textLeft: So, can you stick with me a little longer?
I want you to help me see this through to the end.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry, I'm in it for the long haul.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!
